did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Flyers for Out in the World events, memos and correspondence with other campus groups and facilities, financial records, brochures presenting information about AIDS in different languages, files on political issues on and off campus, such as a letter to Senator D'Amato about gays in the military, and flyers for student trustee candidate Julie Crotty.

bioghist.head: BIOGRAPHICAL NOTE
bioghist.p: A social and discussion group established in the summer of 1992 for gay, lesbian, bisexual, and questioning students of all nationalities, open to all members of the Cornell and Ithaca communities, that provided supportive gatherings and forums to discuss lesbian and gay issues relevant to international students and scholars.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Flyers for Out in the World events, memos and correspondence with other campus groups and facilities, financial records, brochures presenting information about AIDS in different languages, files on political issues on and off campus, such as a letter to Senator D'Amato about gays in the military, and flyers for student trustee candidate Julie Crotty.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Out in the World records, #7594. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.
